comment._content: John Ashley Soames Grenville, historian, born 11 January 1928; died 7 March 2011 His magnum opus, The Jews of Hamburg: The Death of a Civilization from 1790 to the Holocaust, will appear this autumn. www.guardian.co.uk/books/2011/may/22/john-grenville-obituary
